title: Nijigaku’s Live Day 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Shioriko-chan, what are you doing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’m sorting through the pictures we took together yesterday.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Wow, these pictures are amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufu, I know, right? Looking at them makes me want to perform even harder today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Definitely...... Rina-chan Board says, “Determined!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Pictures aren’t just for preserving memories but also for giving us strength.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Indeed. With that said, let’s take a lot of pictures today too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Then, let’s take some more now. Get closer, you two. Let’s work hard again today. Rina-chan Board says, “Cheese!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Cheese!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Cheese!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
